title: ‘Finite’ Market-Maker Capital For ETF Share Classes: Valerie Grimba
description: Valerie Grimba, director of global ETF strategy from RBC Capital Markets, joins "Bloomberg ETF IQ" to discuss dual-share classes and the year ahead for 2026. (Source: Bloomberg)
content: Valerie Grimba, director of global ETF strategy from RBC Capital Markets, joins "Bloomberg ETF IQ" to discuss dual-share classes and the year ahead for 2026. (Source: Bloomberg)
